text:
MARK HAMILL has marked Star Wars Day — May the fourth, geddit? — by surprising some of the franchise’s greatest fans.

The unsuspecting lot were invited along to a studio to recreate their favourite moments from the films, but little did they know that their hero Hamill was waiting in the wings.

The fans were asked to ‘channel their inner Mark Hamill’, producing some extraordinary results — and when the Star Wars actor joined in, their reactions were priceless.

Hamill also used the video to announce the chance to win a special pre-screening of The Last Jedi and lunch with him in LA.
title: Mark Hamill pranks Star Wars fans
